name: Snack Wizard
description: A mysterious figure in a robe made of convenience store receipts.

dialogue.greeting: Ah, seeker of eternal flavors! What snack speaks to your soul?

about_magic.initial: Every slushie contains a universe of taste...
about_magic.wisdom: The secret is in the infinite refills of possibility.
about_magic.power: True power lies in knowing which snack combinations unlock reality.
